author: Simon Difford
description: In cockney rhyming slang 'apples and pears' means 'stairs'. The flavours of the fruits also combine well, here fortified with vodka.
name: Apples 'n' Pears
recipeIngredient: 30 ml Apple juice (apple cider) unsweetened & cloudy

recipeInstructions.text: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass
